tool_description: The "Word Wizard API" is a powerful and versatile tool for text processing and manipulation. With its wide range of features, developers can easily perform tasks such as string reversal, capitalization, word counting, anagram checking and palindrome checking. Whether you are working on a text-based algorithm or need to process and analyze large amounts of text data, this API is the perfect tool for the job. From simple string manipulation to advanced text analysis, the Word Wizard API has got...
title: Word Wizard API

api_list.name: Palindrome Check
api_list.description: This endpoint takes a GET request with a query parameter "string" and returns a JSON object that includes the result whether the string is palindrome or not.

api_list.name: Anagram Check
api_list.description: This endpoint takes two GET request with query parameter "word1" and "word2" and returns a JSON object that includes the result whether the two words are anagram or not.

api_list.name: Word Stats
api_list.description: This endpoint takes a GET request with a query parameter "string" and returns a JSON object that includes the count of the each unique word in the string

api_list.name: Word Count
api_list.description: This endpoint takes a GET request with a query parameter "string" and returns the number of words in the string.

api_list.name: Capitalize String
api_list.description: This endpoint takes a GET request with a query parameter "string" and returns the capitalized string

api_list.name: Reverse String
api_list.description: This endpoint takes a GET request with a query parameter "string" and returns the reverse of that string
